full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SDE BRGYAD KYI MCHOD PA GSER SKYEMS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BSNU BA BAN SANGS RGYAS YE SHES KYI MDZAD PA'I GSER SKYEMS 'DI NI SER BA BSRUNGS SRE'U GSO BA GTOR MA 'PHEN PA MDOS GLUD BTONG BA SOGS LAS RNAMS GANG BYED KYI SNGON DU 'GRO BA YIN PA'I, ,SDE BRGYAD KYI MCHOD PA 'DI MED NA BYIS PA'I MKHAR LAS BYED PA DANG 'BRA CES GSUNGS SDE BRGYAD SPYI BCOS BSGRUBS SANGS RGYAS YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
